Earlier this week, Steve Ballmer announced that Bob Muglia, president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business, would depart the company this summer. While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools Business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, he wrote in a Jan. 10 e-mail to company employees.`` We are now ready to build on our success and move forward into the era of cloud computing.''
